result.eng: I met the Prime Minister, and I met the President as well.
result.ga: bhuail mé leis an taoiseach agus bhuail mé leis an uachtarán chomh maith
result.orig: Bhuail mé leis an Taoiseach agus bhuail mé leis an Uachtarán chomh maith
result.html: bhuail mé leis an taoiseach agus bhuail mé leis an uachtarán chomh maithI met the Prime Minister, and I met the President as well.
result.ponchtml: ḃuail mé leis an taoiseaċ agus ḃuail mé leis an uaċtarán ċoṁ maiṫI met the Prime Minister, and I met the President as well.

result.eng: It is the case that the Prime Minister has made some mistakes.
result.ga: is amhlaidh go ndearna an taoiseach roinnt botún
result.orig: Is amhlaidh go ndearna an Taoiseach roinnt botún
result.html: is amhlaidh go ndearna an taoiseach roinnt botúnIt is the case that the Prime Minister has made some mistakes.
result.ponchtml: is aṁlaiḋ go ndearna an taoiseaċ roinnt botúnIt is the case that the Prime Minister has made some mistakes.
